casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Samuel SHUFORD. No. 503P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of September 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for a Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
